summary: Provides a utility to balance the English Google Text Normalization training data by upsampling under‑represented entity classes (e.g., MONEY, MEASURE, TIME, FRACTION). It analyses class patterns in the primary data file, locates additional sentences with those patterns from other processed files, and appends them to create a more evenly distributed output file.
business_intent: Enhance the quality of text‑normalization models by generating a class‑balanced training dataset, thereby improving model accuracy on scarce entity types.
